attributes.long-description:
The RPG Mars War Logs takes you to Mars, nearly a century after the cataclysm that threw the planet and its colonists into chaos. Water has become the most precious resource on the planet, with a few companies fighting a perpetual war for its control.
In the middle of this struggle, play as Roy, a renegade who finds himself dragged in an epic story where every choice counts.

1 player
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
DUALSHOCK®3
Network Features
